EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Narrow-format Flight Deck Printer Repair and Manufacturing Fully Transferring to AstroNova
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NARROW-FORMAT FLIGHT DECK PRINTER MANUFACTURING AND REPAIRS TO ASTRONOVA Dear Customer:
As previously communicated, Honeywell has executed a licensing agreement with AstroNova Inc., a leading cockpit printer manufacturer. AstroNova will manufacture and repair our model PTA-45B narrow-format flight deck printers.
Part Numbers Impacted
8055515-4501 8055515-4503 8055515-4506
8055515-4502 8055515-4504 8055515-4507
Vendor Information
Changes are being made to the aftermarket repair support structure for the PTA-45B printers installed on all platforms.
- AstroNova has contracted with various suppliers to establish repair facilities in multiple regions. - Access the AstroNova website <[[https://aerospace.astronovainc.com/support/repair-services/]]> to view the information on these locations. - Certifications offered at the various facilities: FAA, EASA, CAAC, DCA, DGCA.
- Be sure to select a location that provides the certification required. - To ensure that the ordering placement process is seamless, please update your authorized supplier list and internal systems to include the new supplier location(s) as approved suppliers.
Effective Date
- As of May 24, 2019 repair services will only be offered by AstroNova. - Any units received at Honeywell sites after May 24, 2019 will be ‘Returned As Is’.
